message:
[Action Options]
1) PICK <obj>, Only PICK if gripper is empty. PICK only the correct next item according to the recipe.
2) PUT <obj1> <obj2>. <obj1> can be one of the foods. <obj2> can be food, cutting_board, or table.
3) WAIT, do nothing.
Only one robot can PUT each round. You must PICK up an item before PUT. 
[Action Output Instruction]
Think step-by-step about your plan and output your idea, and then output 'PROCEED
', give exactly one action for yourself, put on a new line, you are allowed to propose only one action for yourself!
Example#1: Dave, please PICK cheese. I will WAIT this round.
PROCEED
NAME Chad ACTION WAIT
Example#2: Alright, Chad, I will PUT cheese on the cucumber and you can PICK ham this round.
PROCEED
NAME Dave ACTION PUT cheese cucumber

[Previous Round History]
== Previous Round# ==
[Chat History]
[Chad]:
Dave, since bread_slice1 is now on the cutting_board, I will PICK the tomato and prepare to PUT it on the bread_slice1 next. Please WAIT this round so I can complete this action.

PROCEED
NAME Chad ACTION PICK tomato
[Evaluation Score]:
The advantage score of Chad's action is -1.2445!
The score is low and the plan need to be changed!
[Chad]:
Dave, I made a mistake in my previous action. Since bread_slice1 is already on the cutting_board, I should PICK the cucumber, as it is the next ingredient in the recipe after the tomato, which you will be handling. I will PICK cucumber and prepare to PUT it on the bread_slice1 after you have PUT the tomato. Please WAIT this round so I can complete this action.

PROCEED
NAME Chad ACTION PICK cucumber
[Evaluation Score]:
The advantage score of Chad's action is -2.052!
The score is low and the plan need to be changed!
[Chad]:
Dave, I apologize for the confusion earlier. Since the bread_slice1 is on the cutting_board, it's time to start building the sandwich. I will PICK the tomato, which is the next ingredient to be placed on the bread_slice1. Please WAIT this round so I can PICK the tomato.

PROCEED
NAME Chad ACTION PICK tomato
[Evaluation Score]:
The advantage score of Chad's action is -1.2445!
The advantage score is high enough.
[Dave]:
Chad, you are correct that the tomato is the next ingredient, but it's on my side of the table. I will PICK the tomato and prepare to PUT it on the bread_slice1 on the cutting_board. You should WAIT this round so I can complete this action.

PROCEED
NAME Dave ACTION PICK tomato
[Evaluation Score]:
The advantage score of Dave's action is 5.0676!
The advantage score is high enough.
[Chad]:
Dave, since the tomato is on my side and you cannot reach it, I will PICK the tomato and prepare to PUT it on the bread_slice1 on the cutting_board. You should WAIT this round so I can complete this action.

PROCEED
NAME Chad ACTION PICK tomato
[Evaluation Score]:
The advantage score of Chad's action is -1.2445!
The score is low and the plan need to be changed!
[Chad]:
Dave, I will PICK the cucumber since it's the next ingredient after the tomato and it's on my side. You should WAIT this round so I can complete this action.

PROCEED
NAME Chad ACTION PICK cucumber
[Evaluation Score]:
The advantage score of Chad's action is -2.052!
The score is low and the plan need to be changed!
[Chad]:
Dave, since the tomato is on my side and you cannot reach it, I will PICK the tomato and prepare to PUT it on the bread_slice1 on the cutting_board in the next round. You should WAIT this round so I can complete this action.

PROCEED
NAME Chad ACTION PICK tomato
[Evaluation Score]:
The advantage score of Chad's action is -1.2445!
The advantage score is high enough.
[Dave]:
Chad, since you will PICK the tomato, I will prepare for the next step. I will PICK the bacon, which is the next ingredient after the tomato, and get ready to PUT it on the sandwich once the tomato is in place. Please proceed with PICKing the tomato.

PROCEED
NAME Dave ACTION PICK bacon
[Evaluation Score]:
The advantage score of Dave's action is 5.9983!
The advantage score is high enough.
[Executed Action]
Chad: PICK tomato
Dave: PICK bacon
== Current Round ==

[Current Rounde Previous Chat]
[Chad]:
Dave, since I am currently holding the tomato, I will PUT the tomato on bread_slice1 on the cutting_board. This follows the recipe order correctly. You should WAIT this round so I can complete this action.

PROCEED
NAME Chad ACTION PUT tomato bread_slice1
[Evaluation Score]:
The advantage score of Chad's action is 2.2957!
The advantage score is high enough.
[Dave]:
Chad, that's a good move. Since you are putting the tomato on bread_slice1, I will WAIT this round as we cannot PUT at the same time. Next round, I will be ready to PUT the bacon on top of the tomato.

PROCEED
NAME Dave ACTION WAIT
[Evaluation Score]:
The advantage score of Dave's action is -0.2171!
The advantage score is high enough.

You are a robot Chad, collaborating with Dave to make a [big_sandwich].
Food items must be stacked following this order: bread_slice1, tomato, bacon, cucumber, cheese, ham, bread_slice2, where bread_slice1 must be PUT on cutting_board. 
You must stay on right side of the table! This means you can only PICK food from right side, and Dave can only PICK from the other side.
Only one robot can PUT at a time, so you must coordiate with Dave.

At the current round:
You can see these food items are on your reachable side:
cucumber: on your side
ham: on your side
beef_patty: on your side
Your gripper is holding tomato
Think step-by-step about the task and Dave's response. Carefully check and correct them if they made a mistake. 
Improve your plans if given [Environment Feedback].
Respond very concisely but informatively, and do not repeat what others have said. Discuss with others to come up with the best plan.
Each Chad or Dave's response will get an advantage score. If the score exceeds the given number, the answer will be considered as helpful to the completion of this task. 
The higher the advantage score, the greater the contribution.You can find the advantage score information in [Evaluation Score].
If [Improve Feedback] exists, please revise the plan according to the information provided by it to better complete this task!
Propose exactly one action for yourself at the **current** round, select from [Action Options].
End your response by either: 1) If everyone has made proposals and got approved, output the final plan, must strictly follow [Action Output Instruction]!

[Environment Feedback]:
- Previous Plan:
NAME Chad ACTION PUT tomato bread_slice1
NAME Dave ACTION WAIT
Task Constraints:
 faild, bread_slice1 is not on cutting_board
You are Chad, your response is:

Dave, it seems there was a misunderstanding. The bread_slice1 needs to be on the cutting_board before we can start stacking the ingredients. Since I am holding the tomato, I will WAIT this round. You should PICK bread_slice1 and PUT it on the cutting_board. Once that's done, we can proceed with the recipe.

PROCEED
NAME Chad ACTION WAIT

[Scores]
[Chad Response]:
Dave, since I am currently holding the tomato, I will PUT the tomato on bread_slice1 on the cutting_board. This follows the recipe order correctly. You should WAIT this round so I can complete this action.

PROCEED
NAME Chad ACTION PUT tomato bread_slice1
[Evaluation Score]:
The advantage score of Chad's action is 2.2957!

[Dave Response]:
Chad, that's a good move. Since you are putting the tomato on bread_slice1, I will WAIT this round as we cannot PUT at the same time. Next round, I will be ready to PUT the bacon on top of the tomato.

PROCEED
NAME Dave ACTION WAIT
[Evaluation Score]:
The advantage score of Dave's action is -0.2171!

[Chad Response]:
Dave, it seems there was a misunderstanding. The bread_slice1 needs to be on the cutting_board before we can start stacking the ingredients. Since I am holding the tomato, I will WAIT this round. You should PICK bread_slice1 and PUT it on the cutting_board. Once that's done, we can proceed with the recipe.

PROCEED
